# bankr.isp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bankr.isp is to read bank reports from Intesa San Paolo.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bankr.isp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("bankrr/bankr.isp")
```

## Principles

- Low dependencies
- Conservative tidying (no new columns)
